fields.name: Clarity of Heart (C1)
fields.value: Spring Spirit Summoning can be used 1 more time.

fields.name: Centered Spirit (C2)
fields.value: Divine Maiden's Deliverance lasts for 6 seconds longer. Active characters within the skill's field deals 15% increased Cryo CRIT DMG.

fields.name: Seclusion (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Spring Spirit Summoning by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Insight (C4)
fields.value:
When characters under the effect of Icy Quill applied by Shenhe trigger its DMG Bonus effects, Shenhe will gain a Skyfrost Mantra stack:
- When Shenhe uses Spring Spirit Summoning, she will consume all stacks of Skyfrost Mantra, increasing the DMG of that Spring Spirit Summoning by 5% for each stack consumed.
- Max 50 stacks. Stacks last for 60s.

fields.name: Divine Attainment (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Divine Maiden's Deliverance by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Mystical Abandon (C6)
fields.value: When characters trigger Icy Quill's effects using Normal and Charged Attack DMG, it does not count toward the Trigger Quota.
